    • Constructor Detail

      • C3PO

        public C3PO(int hitpoints,
            edu.monash.fit2099.simulator.userInterface.MessageRenderer m,
            starwars.SWWorld world)
        Create a C3PO. It doesn't move and stays in the same location. It just speaks and it has a 10% chance of saying something at each turn.
        Parameters:
        hitpoints - the number of hit points of this Droid. If this decreases to below zero, the Droid will become immobile.
        m - MessageRenderer to display messages.
        world - the SWWorld world to which this Droid belongs to

    • Method Detail

        It doesn't move and stays in the same location. It just speaks. It has a 10% chance of saying something at each turn.
